property.name: text
property.value: DE director stopWhenQueueIsEmpty false synchronizeToRealTime true

property.name: text
property.value: POST /room/markers Calculates and returns illumination at the sensor

property.name: text
property.value:
See also: SmartRoom demo Scale: One pixel = 1 centimeter (Room would be roughly 15 x 15 feet, 225 sq ft)
Equation: Luminous intensity on a spherical surface I = (3P) / (4*pi*r^2) where P is power in watts or lumens = Lumens per meter squared

property.name: text
property.value: GET /room/light Returns light status and light amount Request is cached until a light status change occurs ("long polling") (See SensorAndrew demo)

property.name: text
property.value: GET /room request Returns main page; Initial light status is off Generates GET to /room/light and then POST to /room/markers

property.name: text
property.value: TODO: Should lightIsOn and thresholds be initialized for every GET request (e.g. page refresh?)

property.name: text
property.value: This model provides a web service for configuring a light and a sensor in a room. The sensor will turn the light on and off according to user-defined thresholds. Thrashing (repeated on/off light behavior) may occur depending on the thresholds and the proximity of the light to the sensor. Drag light or sensor to change proximity.

property.name: text
property.value: Assume only one light, one sensor for now

entity.name: IterateOverArray
entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!
Convert string x, y coordinates to doubles ExpressionToToken, ExpressionToToken2 output ports set to double (Right click -> Customize -> Ports)

entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!
Convert string x, y coordinates to doubles ExpressionToToken, ExpressionToToken2 output ports set to double (Right click -> Customize -> Ports)

entity.name: FileReader
entity.doc: Read an entire file and output as a string
